channel.title: Web Development on ADeveloperHasNoName
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on ADeveloperHasNoName

item.title: SAFA
item.description: SAFA is a web interface for managing eSports FIFA tournaments, offering features like team creation, stats profiles, and Discord-integrated authentication.

item.title: Tournament Scheduler
item.description: A feature-rich web application for generating customizable round-robin tournament schedules, incorporating user-defined constraints and parameters to create tailored sports schedules. Built with a focus on flexibility and algorithmic efficiency.

item.title: What are HTTP and HTTPS Protocols?
item.description: Explore HTTP and HTTPS protocols, their workings, methods, status codes, versions, and security mechanisms that underpin modern web communication.

item.title: What Are Browser HTTP Cookies?
item.description: Learn what browser HTTP cookies are, their purpose, how they work, and their attributes. This article explains their use in session management, personalization, tracking, and web advertising.

item.title: Overcoming Concurrent Refresh Attempts of Access Tokens (JWT)
item.description: Learn how to handle concurrent refresh attempts of JWT-based access tokens in single-page applications using Redis-based locking mechanisms for robust token management.

item.title: Overcoming (discord) API Rate Limits With Redis Cache
item.description: Learn how to tackle Discord API rate limits in your web application by implementing a Redis-based caching mechanism for efficiency and compliance.
